title: Mapping the Story Inside from the Stories Outside
description:
When I first started to try to figure out @Jordan B Peterson I had to do some reading in Jung. I read Memories, Reflections and Dreams by Jung. https://amzn.to/3dGlEFc When he was trying to treat those who were locked up as deranged he noted that they were trying to work out the stories outside with the stories inside. That process continues for all of us. 

@Jordan B Peterson and @Bret Weinstein https://youtu.be/2O_gW4VWZ5c
Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris Douglas Murray Dublin https://youtu.be/ZZI-FwSQRn8
Maps of Meaning https://amzn.to/39LgZ41
@Jonathan Pageau Parasitic Story Telling https://youtu.be/gFxu3Q71NvE
@Benjamin A Boyce and @John Vervaeke https://youtu.be/CBuPbplRZFQ
the Sopranos https://amzn.to/3ur0hP7
Fewer than half Americans are part of a church https://www.christianitytoday.com/news/2021/march/gallup-church-membership-decline-minority-nones-us.html
Vikings Season 1 https://amzn.to/3rN5nna
Bishop Barron Vikings https://youtu.be/AnHCFOV4K6U
CS Lewis Mere Christianity https://amzn.to/3dS50Tx
Nerdwriter1 How Marvelman Changed Superhero Stories https://youtu.be/Z2yZwh_gCIU
Watchmen Explained https://youtu.be/wJmg0uc3CjY
Jordan Peterson John Vervake https://youtu.be/-RCtSsxhb2Q
